verses.verse: טֽוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> Better רָ֭שׁ <S%H7326><s%> [is] the poor הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> that walketh בְּתֻמּ֑וֹ <S%H8537><s%> in his integrity מֵעִקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H6141><s%> than [he that is] perverse שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <S%H8193><s%> in his lips וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> and is כְסִֽיל׃ <S%H3684><s%> and is a fool

גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> Also בְּלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> to be without דַ֣עַת <S%H1847><s%> [be] without knowledge נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Also [that] the soul לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> to be without ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [it is] not good וְאָ֖ץ <S%H213><s%> and he that hasteth בְּרַגְלַ֣יִם <S%H7272><s%> with [his] feet חוֹטֵֽא׃ <S%H2398><s%> sinneth

אִוֶּ֣לֶת <S%H200><s%> The foolishness אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> of man תְּסַלֵּ֣ף <S%H5557><s%> perverteth דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> his way וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD יִזְעַ֥ף <S%H2196><s%> fretteth לִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> and his heart

ה֗וֹן <S%H1952><s%> Wealth יֹ֭סִיף <S%H3254><s%> maketh רֵעִ֣ים <S%H7453><s%> friends רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many וְ֝דָ֗ל <S%H1800><s%> but the poor מֵרֵ֥עהוּ <S%H7453><s%> from his neighbour יִפָּרֵֽד׃ <S%H6504><s%> is separated

עֵ֣ד <S%H5707><s%> witness שְׁ֭קָרִים <S%H8267><s%> A false לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִנָּקֶ֑ה <S%H5352><s%> shall not be unpunished וְיָפִ֥יחַ <S%H6315><s%> and [he that] speaketh כְּ֝זָבִ֗ים <S%H3577><s%> lies לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִמָּלֵֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> shall not escape

רַ֭בִּים <S%H7227><s%> Many יְחַלּ֣וּ <S%H2470><s%> will intreat פְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> the favour נָדִ֑יב <S%H5081><s%> of the prince וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הָ֝רֵ֗עַ <S%H7453><s%> and every man [is] a friend לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to him מַתָּֽן׃ <S%H4976><s%> that giveth gifts

כָּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> All אֲחֵי־ <S%H251><s%> All the brethren רָ֨שׁ ׀ <S%H7326><s%> of the poor שְֽׂנֵאֻ֗הוּ <S%H8130><s%> do hate אַ֤ף <S%H637><s%> How כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> do מְ֭רֵעֵהוּ <S%H4828><s%> him how much more do his friends רָחֲק֣וּ <S%H7368><s%> go far מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at מְרַדֵּ֖ף <S%H7291><s%> from him? he pursueth אֲמָרִ֣ים <S%H561><s%> [them with] words [לֹא־ כ] (לֹו־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like ק)

קֹֽנֶה־ <S%H7069><s%> He that getteth לֵּ֭ב <S%H3820><s%> wisdom אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> loveth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his own soul שֹׁמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> he that keepeth תְּ֝בוּנָ֗ה <S%H8394><s%> understanding לִמְצֹא־ <S%H4672><s%> shall find טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> good

עֵ֣ד <S%H5707><s%> witness שְׁ֭קָרִים <S%H8267><s%> A false לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִנָּקֶ֑ה <S%H5352><s%> shall not be unpunished וְיָפִ֖יחַ <S%H6315><s%> and [he that] speaketh כְּזָבִ֣ים <S%H3577><s%> lies יֹאבֵֽד׃ <S%H6><s%> shall perish פ

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not נָאוֶ֣ה <S%H5000><s%> is not seemly לִכְסִ֣יל <S%H3684><s%> for a fool תַּעֲנ֑וּג <S%H8588><s%> Delight אַ֝֗ף <S%H637><s%> less כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְעֶ֤בֶד ׀ <S%H5650><s%> much less for a servant מְשֹׁ֬ל <S%H4910><s%> to have rule בְּשָׂרִֽים׃ <S%H8269><s%> over princes

שֵׂ֣כֶל <S%H7922><s%> The discretion אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> of a man הֶאֱרִ֣יךְ <S%H748><s%> deferreth אַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> his anger וְ֝תִפאַרְתּ֗וֹ <S%H8597><s%> and [it is] his glory עֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> to pass over עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פָּֽשַׁע׃ <S%H6588><s%> a transgression

נַ֣הַם <S%H5099><s%> [is] as the roaring כַּ֭כְּפִיר <S%H3715><s%> of a lion זַ֣עַף <S%H2197><s%> wrath מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king's וּכְטַ֖ל <S%H2919><s%> [is] as dew עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עֵ֣שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> upon the grass רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7522><s%> but his favour

הַוֹּ֣ת <S%H1942><s%> [is] the calamity לְ֭אָבִיו <S%H1><s%> of his father בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> son כְּסִ֑יל <S%H3684><s%> A foolish וְדֶ֥לֶף <S%H1812><s%> dropping טֹ֝רֵ֗ד <S%H2956><s%> [are] a continual מִדְיְנֵ֥י <S%H4079><s%> and the contentions אִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> of a wife

בַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> House וָ֭הוֹן <S%H1952><s%> and riches נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> [are] the inheritance אָב֑וֹת <S%H1><s%> of fathers וּ֝מֵיְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] from the LORD אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> wife מַשְׂכָּֽלֶת׃ <S%H7919><s%> and a prudent

עַ֭צְלָה <S%H6103><s%> Slothfulness תַּפִּ֣יל <S%H5307><s%> casteth תַּרְדֵּמָ֑ה <S%H8639><s%> into a deep sleep וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> soul רְמִיָּ֣ה <S%H7423><s%> and an idle תִרְעָֽב׃ <S%H7456><s%> shall suffer hunger

שֹׁמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> He that keepeth מִ֭צְוָה <S%H4687><s%> the commandment שֹׁמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> keepeth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his own soul בּוֹזֵ֖ה <S%H959><s%> [but] he that despiseth דְרָכָ֣יו <S%H1870><s%> his ways [יוּמָת כ] (יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> crying ק)

מַלְוֵ֣ה <S%H3867><s%> lendeth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD ח֣וֹנֵֽן <S%H2603><s%> He that hath pity דָּ֑ל <S%H1800><s%> upon the poor וּ֝גְמֻל֗וֹ <S%H1576><s%> and that which he hath given יְשַׁלֶּם־ <S%H7999><s%> will he pay him again לֽוֹ׃

יַסֵּ֣ר <S%H3256><s%> Chasten בִּ֭נְךָ <S%H1121><s%> thy son כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> while יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> while there is תִּקְוָ֑ה <S%H8615><s%> hope וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֲ֝מִית֗וֹ <S%H4191><s%> for his crying אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> spare נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> and let not thy soul

[גֹּרַל־ כ] (גְּֽדָל־ <S%H1632><s%> of great חֵ֭מָה <S%H1632><s%> of great ק) נֹ֣שֵׂא <S%H5375><s%> shall suffer עֹ֑נֶשׁ <S%H6066><s%> punishment כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תַּ֝צִּ֗יל <S%H5337><s%> for if thou deliver וְע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again תּוֹסִֽף׃ <S%H3254><s%> [him] yet thou must do it again

שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear עֵ֭צָה <S%H6098><s%> counsel וְקַבֵּ֣ל <S%H6901><s%> and receive מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> instruction לְ֝מַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תֶּחְכַּ֥ם <S%H2449><s%> that thou mayest be wise בְּאַחֲרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H319><s%> in thy latter end

רַבּ֣וֹת <S%H7227><s%> [There are] many מַחֲשָׁב֣וֹת <S%H4284><s%> devices בְּלֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> in a man's וַעֲצַ֥ת <S%H6098><s%> nevertheless the counsel יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> he תָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> that shall stand

תַּאֲוַ֣ת <S%H8378><s%> The desire אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> of a man חַסְדּ֑וֹ <S%H2617><s%> [is] his kindness וְטֽוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> [is] better רָ֝שׁ <S%H7326><s%> and a poor man מֵאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> than כָּזָֽב׃ <S%H3577><s%> a liar

יִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> The fear יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְחַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> [tendeth] to life וְשָׂבֵ֥עַ <S%H7649><s%> satisfied יָ֝לִ֗ין <S%H3885><s%> and [he that hath it] shall abide בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest יִפָּ֥קֶד <S%H6485><s%> he shall not be visited רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> with evil

טָ֘מַ֤ן <S%H2934><s%> [man] hideth עָצֵ֣ל <S%H6102><s%> A slothful יָ֭דוֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand בַּצַּלָּ֑חַת <S%H6747><s%> in [his] bosom גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his פִּ֝֗יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> it to his mouth לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יְשִׁיבֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7725><s%> again

לֵ֣ץ <S%H3887><s%> a scorner תַּ֭כֶּה <S%H5221><s%> Smite וּפֶ֣תִי <S%H6612><s%> and the simple יַעְרִ֑ם <S%H6191><s%> will beware וְהוֹכִ֥יחַ <S%H3198><s%> and reprove לְ֝נָב֗וֹן <S%H995><s%> one that hath understanding יָבִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> [and] he will understand דָּֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> knowledge

מְֽשַׁדֶּד־ <S%H7703><s%> He that wasteth אָ֭ב <S%H1><s%> [his] father יַבְרִ֣יחַ <S%H1272><s%> [and] chaseth away אֵ֑ם <S%H517><s%> [his] mother בֵּ֝֗ן <S%H1121><s%> [is] a son מֵבִ֥ישׁ <S%H954><s%> that causeth shame וּמַחְפִּֽיר׃ <S%H2659><s%> and bringeth reproach

חַֽדַל־ <S%H2308><s%> Cease בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> my son לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> to hear מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> the instruction לִ֝שְׁג֗וֹת <S%H7686><s%> [that causeth] to err מֵֽאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> from the words דָֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> of knowledge

עֵ֣ד <S%H5707><s%> witness בְּ֭לִיַּעַל <S%H1100><s%> An ungodly יָלִ֣יץ <S%H3887><s%> scorneth מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> and the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יְבַלַּע־ <S%H1104><s%> devoureth אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> iniquity

נָכ֣וֹנוּ <S%H3559><s%> are prepared לַלֵּצִ֣ים <S%H3887><s%> for scorners שְׁפָטִ֑ים <S%H8201><s%> Judgments וּ֝מַהֲלֻמ֗וֹת <S%H4112><s%> and stripes לְגֵ֣ו <S%H1460><s%> for the back כְּסִילִֽים׃ <S%H3684><s%> of fools
